name: Purple vs Yellow
description:
Purple vs Yellow

A two player game I made for the STOP WAITING FOR GODOT jam.

It's inspired by Sagittarius by George Prosser.

Credits:

  • Player sprites: Pixel Line Platformer (1.0) by Kenney
  • Planets sprites: Pixel planets by Master848
  • Background art: Space Background by Luis Zuno (@ansimuz)
  • Keyboard icons: Pixel Fantasy RPG icons by Caz Wolf
  • Music: My Little Bots Crazy Music by DavidKBD
  • Explosion sfx: 2 High Quality Explosions by Michel Baradari
  • Rocket launcher sfx 4 projectile launches by Michel Baradari
  • Win sfx: Ta Da! by Mike Koenig
  • Lose sfx: Created using Chiptone
  • Fonts: CATV 6X12 9 by HolyBlackCat
  • Fonts: Tomorrow by Tony de Marco and Monica Rizzolli
